keep_the_authentication_code: [CY] Keep the authentication code in a safe place, as you may still need it in the future.

title: [CY] What happens now you’ve restored your digital authorisation - Find and update company information - GOV.UK
weve_sent_an_email: [CY] We’ve sent an email to any other people who are authorised. We’ve let them know you are digitally authorised to file online for this company.
